alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleburne; St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:24PM CDT until June 25 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TALLADEGA...SOUTHWESTERN CALHOUN...EAST CENTRAL ST. CLAIR AND SOUTHWESTERN CLEBURNE COUNTIES... At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ragland to near Talladega, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Talladega, Pell City, Cobb Town, West End-Cobb Town, Saks, Lincoln, Riverside, Ragland, Munford, Ohatchee, Hobson City, Talladega Superspeedway, Anniston Regional Airport, Talladega Municipal Airport, Grant Town, Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, Oxford Lake and Bynum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
